programme.title: Kicks, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A 15-year-old (Jahking Guillory) recruits his two best friends (Christopher Meyer, Christopher Jordan Wallace) to help him retrieve his stolen Air Jordan sneakers from a neighborhood thug (Kofi Siriboe).

programme.title: Wilson, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: After reuniting with his ex-wife (Laura Dern), a lonely and neurotic misanthrope (Woody Harrelson) tries to form a connection with the teenage daughter (Isabella Amara) he never knew he had.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon and best friend Patsy Stone flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: Low Tide, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: When teenager Alan and his younger brother find a bag of gold coins in a dead man's island home, they try to hide it from their friends -- but one of them, suspicious and violently unpredictable, is willing to do anything to get the money.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Cut Bank, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go from bad to worse when a murder witness (Liam Hemsworth) in small-town Montana tries to leverage the crime into a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Problemista, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Alejandro, an aspiring toy designer from El Salvador, tries to bring his fanciful ideas to life and chase his dream in New York City with the help of his erratic employer.

programme.title: Tell, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A small-time thief (Milo Ventimiglia) makes a big score and tries to keep it from his ex-partner, his ex-wife and other greedy sorts.

programme.title: Confidence, (2003, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A con man (Edward Burns) and his crew swindle a gangster's accountant, then try to repay him by stealing from a crooked banker.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the nations of Earth collaborate on an immense defense program to protect the planet. When the aliens attack with unprecedented force, only the ingenuity of a few brave men and women can save the world.

programme.title: D...: The Musical, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Two self-obsessed businessmen discover they're long-lost identical twins and come together to plot the reunion of their divorced parents.

programme.title: Home Again, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Separated from her husband, Alice lets three young men -- Harry, George and Teddy -- stay in her guesthouse. As Alice develops a budding romance with Harry, her newfound happiness comes crashing down when her ex shows up with a suitcase in his hand.

programme.title: The Color Purple, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: Invictus, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Following the fall of apartheid, Nelson Mandela (Morgan Freeman) tries to unite his countrymen by supporting the South African rugby team's underdog bid for the 1995 World Cup Championship.

programme.title: Gifted, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A man (Chris Evans) wages a legal battle against his mother (Lindsay Duncan) for custody of his orphaned niece (Mckenna Grace), a young mathematics prodigy who wants to live with him.

programme.title: Gloria Bell, (2018, Romance)
programme.desc: A free-spirited divorcee spends her nights on the dance floor, joyfully letting loose at clubs around Los Angeles. She soon finds herself thrust into an unexpected new romance, filled with the joys of budding love and the complications of dating.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: State of Play, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: An investigative journalist (Russell Crowe) stumbles into a cover-up of gigantic proportions as he and his partner probe the murder of a beloved congressman's (Ben Affleck) mistress.

programme.title: Sergio Leone: The Italian Who Invented America, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: An homage to Italian film director Sergio Leone, credited as the pioneer of the spaghetti western subgenre, featuring interviews with Quentin Tarantino, Robert De Niro and Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: The Lovers, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: A man and his wife, each embroiled in an extramarital affair, are sent reeling when they suddenly fall for the least likely person imaginable -- each other.

programme.title: Veronica Mars, (2014, Mystery)
programme.desc: On the eve of her law-school graduation, Veronica turns amateur sleuth once again after ex-boyfriend, Logan, becomes a murder suspect.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: The Martian, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: The Devil's Rejects, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: A vengeful sheriff and two bounty hunters track a murderous family (Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon Zombie) on the run.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A girl turning 16 likes another girl's guy (Michael Schoeffling) and feels nobody cares about her birthday.

programme.title: American Ultra, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When his secret past comes back to haunt him, a small-town stoner (Jesse Eisenberg) must use his latent, deadly skills to prevent the CIA from taking him out.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victim's daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: The Boss, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: After her release from prison, a former CEO (Melissa McCarthy) battles old enemies while trying to build a brownie empire with her ex-assistant (Kristen Bell).

programme.title: The Iron Claw, (2023, Biography)
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgrd) must return to the jungle to save his captive wife (Margot Robbie) from King Leopold's devious envoy (Christoph Waltz).

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: The Lighthouse, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: House Party, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Aspiring club promoters and best buds Damon and Kevin need a huge windfall to make their problems go away. They decide to host the party of the year at an exclusive mansion, which just happens to belong to none other than NBA superstar LeBron James.

programme.title: Good Time, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bank robber stops at nothing to free his brother from prison, launching himself into a nightlong odyssey through New York's dark and dangerous criminal underworld.

programme.title: Gloria Bell, (2018, Romance)
programme.desc: A free-spirited divorcee spends her nights on the dance floor, joyfully letting loose at clubs around Los Angeles. She soon finds herself thrust into an unexpected new romance, filled with the joys of budding love and the complications of dating.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: The Color Purple, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: The Accountant, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Role Models, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Forced to join a mentorship program, two irresponsible men (Seann William Scott, Paul Rudd) must help a pair of impressionable boys navigate the troubled waters of youth.

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke, (2016, Animated)
programme.desc: Batman (Kevin Conroy) must save Commissioner Gordon (Ray Wise) from the Joker's (Mark Hamill) twisted quest to drive him insane.

programme.title: St. Vincent, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between a single woman's 12-year-old son and the boozy misanthrope who lives next door.

programme.title: Superman: Unbound, (2013, Animated)
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: Traffik, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A couple and their two friends embark on a weekend getaway to an isolated estate in the mountains. They soon find themselves in a fight for their lives when members of a violent biker gang show up to protect their secrets from the outside world.

programme.title: Nine Lives, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A workaholic billionaire (Kevin Spacey) tries to communicate with his family when a bizarre turn of events traps him inside the body of a cat named Mr. Fuzzypants.

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: Ruth, a dedicated mother, begins to fear for her troubled teenage daughter.

programme.title: Spaceship Earth, (2020, Documentary)
programme.desc: In 1991 eight visionaries embark on a two-year experiment to quarantine themselves inside Biosphere 2 -- a self-engineered replica of Earth's ecosystem.

programme.title: Valley Girl, (2020, Musical)
programme.desc: A valley girl and a punk rocker from the city defy their parents and friends to stay together.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, (2004, Adventure)
programme.desc: A daredevil aviator (Jude Law) and an ace reporter (Gwyneth Paltrow) fight an evil mastermind and his army of gigantic robots.

programme.title: Outlaws and Angels, (2016, Western)
programme.desc: In 1887, three violent fugitives hold a couple and their children (Francesca Eastwood, Madisen Beaty) hostage in their isolated New Mexico farmhouse.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot, (2016, War)
programme.desc: In 2002, cable news producer Kim Barker shakes up her routine by covering the war in Kabul, Afghanistan.

programme.title: Kate & Leopold, (2001, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A Manhattan woman (Meg Ryan) falls in love with the 19th-century Duke of Albany (Hugh Jackman) who has stepped through a time portal.

programme.title: American Fiction, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fed up with the establishment that profits from Black entertainment that relies on tired and offensive tropes, a frustrated novelist writes an outlandish book of his own that propels him to the heart of hypocrisy and the madness he claims to disdain.

programme.title: Waiting to Exhale, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Relationships preoccupy Phoenix friends: divorcee Bernadine (Angela Bassett), careerist Savannah (Whitney Houston), popular Robin (Lela Rochon), and Gloria, whose ex-husband is gay.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: Nine Bodies in a Mexican Morgue
programme.desc: The survivors work out how to call for help, but are faced with a treacherous climb; as some of the group begin to crack under the pressure, a third death warns that they are running out of time.

programme.title: Nine Bodies in a Mexican Morgue
programme.desc: The deadly secret hidden in Flight CBZ517 is discovered, but it still doesn't explain the murders or help the survivors escape; the passengers believe they have found the traitor in the group.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: A pregnant police chief (Frances McDormand) probes the murderous events that evolved from a desperate car salesman's (William H. Macy) kidnapping scheme.

programme.title: LaRoy, Texas, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mistaken for a low-rent hit man, Ray decides to play the part of a hired gun. However, when the supposedly simple plan begins to unravel, he recruits a private investigator to help him escape from the actual killer and make it out alive.

programme.title: The Parallax View, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A reporter's investigation into a political assassination reveals a nationwide network of trained killers.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: There is more than meets the eye with Alabama native Rocky Dale Davis; people are quick to misjudge him as a typical Southern white boy, but Rocky has a progressive outlook in his comedy.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (1962, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Korean War hero's (Laurence Harvey) commanding officer (Frank Sinatra) discovers he and his platoon were brainwashed.

programme.title: Diablo, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A young Civil War veteran (Scott Eastwood) embarks on a quest to save his kidnapped wife (Camilla Belle) from a band of ruthless Mexican bandits.

programme.title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A '50s-era housewife (Julianne Moore) uses her wit and winnings from commercial jingle contests to help support her large family.

programme.title: Heaven's Gate, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: A well-educated marshal defends immigrant settlers against cattle barons in 1890s Johnson County, Wyoming.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Bridge, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: A rich Midwestern lawyer (Paul Newman), his wife (Joanne Woodward) and their children grow apart in the World War II era.

programme.title: The Fire Inside, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her country's history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: The Boys in the Boat, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: During the height of the Great Depression, members of the rowing team at the University of Washington get thrust into the spotlight as they compete for gold at the 1936 Olympics in Berlin.

programme.title: The Fighter, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Having earned a shot at a world championship, boxer Micky Ward (Mark Wahlberg) reunites with his estranged brother (Christian Bale) to train for the fight and become the new "Pride of Lowell.".

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A therapist (Robin Williams), a mathematician and working-class roughs vie for the soul of a janitor (Matt Damon) with a genius IQ.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to create revolutionary music that changes the world.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke Ellis wakes up at The Institute, a facility that abducts teenagers with psychic powers; Ms. Sigsby, the place's charismatic director, claims they're saving the world; Tim Jamieson hides from his haunted past as a small-town night knocker.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke bonds with the other Front Half residents and begins plotting his escape; Ms. Sigsby manages the fallout from a security breach; in town, Tim begins to look into The Institute, only to find himself caught up in a high-stakes standoff.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Nothing is off limits for Marlena Rodriguez; Ali Sultan reflects on his journey from the Middle East to Minnesota.

programme.title: Mr. Holmes, (2015, Mystery)
programme.desc: Long-retired and near the end of his life, Sherlock Holmes (Ian McKellen) grapples with an unreliable memory and must rely on his housekeeper's son as he revisits the still-unsolved case that led to his retirement.

programme.title: Nerve, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Partnered with a mysterious stranger (Dave Franco), a high school senior (Emma Roberts) joins a popular online game that dares players to perform increasingly dangerous stunts.

programme.title: No Stranger Than Love, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: After his girlfriend is kidnapped while on vacation, an American man is forced to smuggle cocaine over the border. If he's ever to see her alive again, he'll have to navigate a treacherous underworld of violence and greed.

programme.title: Zoolander 2, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A special agent recruits former models Derek Zoolander and Hansel to save the world's most beautiful people from a deadly plot.

programme.title: Down to Earth, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Accidentally sent to Heaven, a comic (Chris Rock) returns to Earth in the body of a Manhattan mogul whose family is plotting to kill him.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Heavenly executive Mr. Jordan allows an angry quarterback (Warren Beatty), taken before his time, to return to Earth as a millionaire.

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: An insecure man (Will Ferrell) competes for the affection of his stepchildren when their freewheeling father (Mark Wahlberg) breezes back into town.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Institute

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A senhora Garrison comea a pensar que est sentindo algo pelo senhor Escravo, mas ele j tem planos de se casar com seu novo amor. Ela decide fazer o possvel para acabar com a lei que permite o matrimnio gay.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman promove o dio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele plida, dizendo que eles no tem alma e no sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.

programme.desc: Abayomi revela sua filha que Jacob tambm seu filho; Abayomi decide deixar Lagos; Jacob vai para a priso com sua me para dar as boas-vindas ao seu irmo Andile.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Lerato est grvida; Prospero no gosta da proposta de Abayomi, o que cria rivalidade entre ele e Jacob; Thembi perdoa Jacob pela sua colaborao com Abayomi; Jacob e Lerato se casam.

programme.title: Um Cara Quase Perfeito, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O agente de Hollywood Jack Giamoro extremamente dedicado ao trabalho, e acaba negligenciando a esposa, Nina. Quando descobre que Nina est saindo com um ator novato, Giamoro comea a escrever um dirio, revelando tudo sobre sua vida.

programme.title: Ataque dos Zumbis, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Desmond um fracassado trabalhando em uma grande empresa de fabricao de armas. Quando uma bebida popular transforma seu chefe e colegas de trabalho em psicopatas violentos, ele precisa encontrar um jeito de sobreviver.

programme.title: Atividade Supernatural, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um dos ilusionistas mais famosos dos EUA prepara um programa de TV para explorar o mundo sobrenatural. Para sua primeira misso, ele recruta um time de especialistas.

programme.title: Uma Juza sem Juzo, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ariane uma juza solteira e totalmente dedicada ao seu trabalho. Aos 40 anos, recebe, de repente, a notcia chocante de que est grvida de um desconhecido. Mais chocante ainda descobrir que o pai um criminoso que est sendo processado.

programme.title: S.O.S. do Amor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Adolescente salva a vida de astro do rock e os dois vo parar no que parece ser uma ilha deserta. Para passar mais tempo com seu dolo, a menina decide dizer que os dois so nufragos, apesar de estarem do lado do hotel onde o cantor est hospedado.

programme.title: Trs Ladres e um Beb, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O compulsivo jogador Slipper v o sequestro do neto de um magnata a salvao de suas dvidas. Quando, junto com seu senhorio e o oportunista Octopus, sequestra BB, sem saber, frustram os planos do crime organizado, que tambm est atrs da criana.

programme.title: Enquanto Somos Jovens, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Josh e Cornelia so um casal de quarentes que decide passar mais tempo com um casal mais jovem que eles. Apesar da juventude e gosto pelo cinema alimentar este novo vnculo, as suspeitas sobre a honestidade do rapaz comeam a pesar.

programme.title: Meet Bill, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um homem frustrado com seu trabalho e com seu casamento tem a ajuda de um adolescente muito seguro de si e de uma jovem vendedora para retomar sua vida. Os dois o tornam mais confiante e independente.

programme.title: A milhares de quilmetros de casa, Valt e Rantaro tm a oportunidade de enfrentar um rosto familiar. Ambos esto entusiasmados em apresentar as novas habilidades de seus Beys, mas Valtryek e Roktavor no so os nicos que evoluram.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: BC Sol e Sunbat United se enfrentam em amistoso, mas as aes no. Valt pode ter enfrentado Silas Karlisle antes, mas nunca o viram arremessar daquele jeito. Free pode usar seu lance pessoal para amarrar as coisas?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Audaz recebe uma segunda chance de enfrentar um antigo rival. Enquanto isso, os veteranos Bladers do BC Sol comeam a sentir a presso quando descobrem que Valt e Rantaro esto subindo na hierarquia.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Aps a sada repentina de um companheiro de equipe, Valt se v em meio a tenses entre os novos e antigos membros do BC Sol. Kris e Trad realizam testes para decidir quais Bladers sero os primeiros a avanar.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: A Liga Europeia comeou oficialmente! Valt faz um novo amigo que compartilha a mesma energia e atitude ldica. Mas quando as suas equipas se enfrentam, rapidamente descobrem que a amizade pode transformar-se numa rivalidade feroz.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Um Velho Amigo acompanha o confronto entre BC Sol e Top Wand. Valr recebe uma segunda chance de enfrentar um novo rival. Nos bastidores, uma oferta tentadora que mudar para sempre o destino do BC Sol colocada em cima da mesa.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Enquanto Valt e Rantaro comemoram sua apario no ranking mundial, a tenso na equipe comea a crescer. A inveja de Silas e dos veteranos Bladers surge, mas isso no o pior.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Numa reviravolta dramtica, Valt e Rantaro so promovidos primeira equipa do BC Sol. Mas sem um dos seus principais membros, a equipe comea uma terrvel srie de derrotas. Como ser possvel para eles corrigir o rumo?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Valt e Rantaro alcanam seu velho amigo, Daigo, o novo capito do AS Gallus. Eles podero ver os novos movimentos do Doomscizor, antes do confronto de suas equipes.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: O grande jogo entre BC Sol e AS Gallus finalmente chegou! Diago percorreu um longo caminho desde seus dias na Bey Club Beigoma Academy. A evoluo de Valtryek ser suficiente para ajudar Valt a derrotar seu velho amigo?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: O BC Sol se prepara para uma partida intensa da Liga Europeia contra o Royals. A estrela Blader de seus oponentes tem contas a acertar com Silas, e Valt decide descobrir o motivo.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: O emocionante confronto entre BC Sol e os Royals continua! Quem ter foras para derrotar o ultra determinado e duro Ghasem Madal? Enquanto isso, Valt recebe notcias perturbadoras sobre um velho amigo.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Depois de descobrirem que Shu desapareceu sem deixar vestgios, Valt, Rantaro, Diago e Wakiya vo em busca de seu ex-companheiro de equipe. A busca os leva a uma jornada pela selva mexicana.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Valt, Rantaro, Wakiya, Daigo e Cuza descobrem o Snake Pit, um centro de treinamento clandestino ultrassecreto. Quando se deparam com um Spryzen novo e evoludo, percebem que esto perto do rastro de Shu.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: A busca por Shu continua! Valt e seus amigos encontram alguns Bladers temveis no Snake Pit, incluindo um vidente, um acrobata e um f rtico.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Valt pode estar perto de dominar seu Bey, mas ainda no consegue passar pelo Snake Pit. Aps aprender uma nova tcnica, ele e seus amigos arriscam tudo em um desafio contra Red Eye.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Depois de uma emocionante aventura na selva mexicana, Valt retorna para casa em BC Sol. A tenso aumenta quando um amigo talentoso aparece para se juntar equipe.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: H emoo no ar quando o astro de cinema Joshua Burns aparece na cidade para filmar seu novo filme de ao. Valt, Audaz e Cuza so escolhidos como os Space Ninjas, os arquiinimigos Blader do heri.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst
programme.sub-title: Joshua Contra os Ninjas do Espao!

programme.title: Luzes, cmera, ao! Valt, Rantaro e Cuza aprenderam suas falas, praticaram seus papis e se destacaram mas ser que conseguiro derrotar Joshua Burns?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: BC Sol est procura de um novo treinador. Ao encontrar um velho veterano, a equipe o convida para completar um perodo de experincia. Embora a equipe esteja entusiasmada, Kris tem algumas reservas sobre a potencial nova contratao.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Com a Liga Mundial chegando, os Clubes esto finalizando os preparativos para o grande evento. Depois de ingressar nos Raging Bulls, Joshua aproveita a oportunidade de se aproximar de seu heri, Free.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Valt recebe uma carta inesperada de Xander. Acontece que seu velho amigo se mudou para o Brasil para ingressar no renomado SB Rios. Mas para provar que merece um lugar na equipe, o gigante sorridente deve passar no teste dos 100 Bladers!
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: BC Sol enfrenta o Royals, em revanche digna de um rei. Desta vez, Valt deve ter certeza de que est preparado. Com a ajuda de Rickson e Raul, ele no descansar at aperfeioar seu novo movimento.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Como bom estar em casa! O retorno de Valt traz algumas recompensas: rever os amigos, reunir-se com a famlia e comer po Bey caseiro.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Emergindo das sombras, um misterioso novo blader faz sua apario no palco da Liga Mundial. Conseguir Cuza descobrir as verdadeiras intenes deste espectro com presas?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Val e suas amigas viajam ao Brasil para o charmoso e animado Carnaval de Bey. Nem tudo corre conforme o planejado, pois os meninos acabam em apuros. Dessa vez, ser necessrio muito mais do que uma atitude positiva para tirar o BC Sol do buraco.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: No h reservas neste confronto de fortes impactos, voos rpidos e metal retorcido, entre BC Sol e SB Rios. A Liga Mundial agora tem os candidatos s semifinais e cada equipe est mais forte do que nunca.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: As demais equipes do torneio da Liga Mundial esto cada vez mais perto de garantir uma vaga na partida final. Valt tem uma oportunidade de ouro para se testar contra seu velho amigo Xander.

programme.title: A final da Liga Mundial est aqui! O evento glamoroso d as boas-vindas a todas as estrelas, antigos rivais e ex-companheiros de equipe, e Valt no gostaria que fosse de outra forma.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: O confronto pico entre os competidores finais continua, e nem mesmo um mdium poderia adivinhar o que vem a seguir. Esses Bladers so os melhores em sua classe, e ambas as equipes esto lado a lado.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: A Final da Liga Mundial continua e se h uma coisa certa que nunca houve um confronto como este. Todo o trabalho do BC Sol leva at este momento decisivo. Quem ter a tenacidade de estar altura da situao e conquistar a coroa?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Depois de aceitar o que parecia ser um desafio impossvel, Red Eye retorna para reivindicar seu lugar como o Blader mais poderoso. Ele no permitir que ningum atrapalhe sua busca por poder e destruio.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Ao saber de um segredo perturbador, Valt decide concentrar toda a sua energia no treinamento. Ele no vai parar por nada at melhorar, independente do passado.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Que comece a festa de boas-vindas! Um velho amigo retorna ao BC Sol, fazendo com que velhos ressentimentos venham tona. Ser ele aceito de braos abertos pelos antigos colegas ou ter que lutar para reconquistar a confiana deles?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: A Bladers International Cup est prestes a comear. Infelizmente, Valt e Kit acabam perdidos em uma arena subterrnea realmente sombria.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Ningum se mexa, porque o torneio est pegando fogo! A Bladers International Cup comeou oficialmente e nada parecido foi visto.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Aunque parece que todo Blader en el mundo quiere derrotarlo, Ojo Rojo contina arrasando en el torneo. Al menos, hasta que el antiguo pupilo del Snake Pit, Norman, tenga oportunidad de enfrentarlo.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Este campeonato coloca rivais contra rivais, inimigos contra inimigos e amigos contra amigos.

programme.desc: Aps vencer a sua primeira batalha contra o crime, o garoto-formiga precisa lidar com as repercusses da fama. Enquanto enfrenta um novo e perigoso vilo, o menino ir fazer de tudo para impedir que um aluno da escola conquiste o corao de Ida.

programme.title: O Relgio Encantado, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Angel uma garota tmida que odeia dizer no. Ela encontra um relgio mgico que realiza desejos e a torna incrivelmente popular. Mas essa nova vida talvez no a deixe realmente feliz.

programme.title: O Reino Gelado 3 - Fogo e Gelo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O raro talento de se meter em problemas o legado da famlia de Kai e Gerda. Crescidos, os irmos se metem em um desastre de propores globais, tudo para encontrar seus pais que esto desaparecidos aps serem levados pelo Vento do Norte.

programme.title: Meu Trabalho um Parto, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Desesperada, Thea finge estar grvida para no perder o emprego. O nico problema que a gravidez uma mentira e agora ela precisa fazer de tudo para convencer a todos de que realmente est esperando um beb.

programme.title: Com Amor, Van Gogh, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um ano aps o suicdio de Vincent Van Gogh, Armand Roulin parte para a cidade francesa de Arles e, junto s pessoas que conheceram Vincent, inicia uma investigao no intuito de decifrar se o artista realmente se matou.

programme.title: Trs Ladres e um Beb, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O compulsivo jogador Slipper v o sequestro do neto de um magnata a salvao de suas dvidas. Quando, junto com seu senhorio e o oportunista Octopus, sequestra BB, sem saber, frustram os planos do crime organizado, que tambm est atrs da criana.

programme.title: Apenas uma Noite, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Michel e Joanna parecem ser o casal ideal. Porm, o marido precisa viajar a trabalho e acaba passando a noite ao lado da bela colega Laura, que no esconde o interesse por ele. Nesta mesma data, Joanna reencontra um amor do passado.

programme.title: Relaes de Famlia, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um homem que se sente enterrado sob uma montanha de dvidas cria uma ligao inesperada com um jovem em uma agncia de cobrana enquanto ambos lutam para se libertar de dvidas, tanto financeiras quanto emocionais.

programme.title: 438 Dias, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Os jornalistas suecos Martin Schibbye e Johan Persson cruzam ilegalmente a fronteira da Somlia com a Etipia para relatar como a busca implacvel por petrleo afetou a populao da regio de Ogaden, isolada e cheia de conflitos.

programme.desc: As equipe kakashi e guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki. Eles correm para se infiltrar mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. O nico jeito de quebrar a barreira removendo os cinco selos de uma s vez.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori

programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Pssaros esto atacando os residentes de uma aldeia nos arredores Pas do Fogo. As equipes de Boruto e Sumire recebem uma misso em conjunto de identificar a causa dos ataques.

programme.desc: Seguindo as informaes dos aldees, Boruto e Sarada vo ao encontro de Jugo. No entanto, ao chegarem no local, o encontram transformado em um monstro feroz e sofrendo com os efeitos da Marca da Maldio.

programme.title: Robinson Crusoe On Mars, (1964, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Stranded on Mars with only a monkey as a companion, an astronaut must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers, (1956, Science fiction)

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)

programme.title: Tigerland, (2000, War Drama)
programme.desc: As a nation stands divided over the war in Vietnam, stark differences of opinion surface among the men of A-Company, triggering unexpected and far-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Action)

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)

programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Trading Places, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: No Mercy, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: In this vengeance-fueled thriller, a martial arts champion will stop at nothing to find her missing younger sister --hunting down the predators that kidnapped and assaulted her one by one.

programme.title: The Villainess, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Bloody revenge is at the heart of this stylish action-thriller that doses the classic femme fatale story with a shot of adrenaline as it follows a former assassin who will stop at nothing to cut ties to her past.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Baby Assassins, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Chisato and Mahilo are two high school girls who are about to graduate. They also happen to both be highly skilled assassins. When the organization they work for orders them to share a room, the relationship between turns sour.

programme.title: Baby Assassins 2, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: After the agency suspends its top assassins, aspiring hitmen decide to eliminate themleading to a lightning-fast showdown between trained killers.

programme.title: Bad City, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: In poverty-stricken Kaiko City, a corrupt mayoral candidate eliminates rival mafias, prompting a released ex-cop to lead a treacherous battle for justice with a special task force in the gritty underworld.

programme.title: One-Percent Warrior, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: After his devastatingly fast, samurai-style combat approach sets filmmakers against him, a legendary action star (Tak Sakaguchi) films his own movieon turf claimed by feuding yakuza gangs, including Japans deadliest martial arts assassin.

programme.title: Drive, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: When a prototype 'enhanced human' on the run from hit men hooks up with a dread-locked bystander, the two elude their pursuers. Starring Brittany Murphy ("8 Mile").

programme.title: Hollywood Homicide, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: A pair of detectives investigate a murder while pursuing their other full-time professions. Welcome to Hollywood Homicide - the only place where you can come to work hungry, horny, thirsty, and broke, and resolve all four by the end of the watch.

programme.title: Baywatch, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: When a dangerous crime wave hits the beach, Lt. Mitch Buchannon (Dwayne Johnson) leads his elite squad of badass lifeguards, including hot-shot recruit Matt Brody (Zac Efron), on a mission to prove you don't have to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Summer Rental, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: This routine comedy is about a series of misadventures during a family vacation at the beach and stars John Candy (who died of a heart attack while filming in Mexico in 1994) as John Chester and Karen Austin as his long-suffering wife Sandy.

programme.title: Surfer, Dude, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Longboarding soul surfer Steve Addington (Matthew McConaughey) returns to Malibu for the summer to find his cool hometown vibe corrupted.

programme.title: Baywatch, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: When a dangerous crime wave hits the beach, Lt. Mitch Buchannon (Dwayne Johnson) leads his elite squad of badass lifeguards, including hot-shot recruit Matt Brody (Zac Efron), on a mission to prove you don't have to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Heathers, (1970, Comedy)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder, Christian Slater, and Shannen Doherty star in this cruelly hilarious dark comedy, which became one of the biggest cult classics of the `80s.

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: Untamed Heart, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Two of today's hottest young actors, Christian Slater and Marisa Tomei, star in this tender romance about lonely souls destined to find one another. Co-starring Rosie Perez.

programme.title: The Thing Called Love, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: In Nashville, there are 10,000 singer-songwriters chasing success... with one chance in a million of getting it. For Miranda "no relation to Elvis" Presley, that's one chance worth taking.

programme.title: Sliding Doors, (1998, Romance)
programme.desc: The split-second moments that can take a life down one path instead of another form the tantalizing 'what if?' in this delightful romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow.

programme.title: Proof, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Oscar-winners Gwyneth Paltrow and Anthony Hopkins star in this powerful story of a young woman haunted by her father's past and the shadow of her own future. Based on the Pulitzer Prize-winning play, PROOF also stars Jake Gyllenhaal and Hope Davis.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally, (1989, Romance)
programme.desc: As Harry Burns and Sally Albright build their lives and careers in Manhattan, their paths continue to cross and their friendship continues to grow until they confront the decision whether to let their friendship develop into romance.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Zodiac, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Based on the Robert Graysmith books about the real life notorious Zodiac, a serial killer who terrorized San Francisco with a string of seemingly random murders during the 1960s and 1970s.

programme.title: The Net, (1995, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock, Dennis Miller and Jeremy Northam star in this hit thriller about a computer expert whose life is "erased" by a computer conspiracy. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)

programme.title: Footloose, (1984, Romance)
programme.desc: A rebellious city boy finds himself in an uptight Midwestern town where dancing and therefore all youthful joy has been banned.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, Action)

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a group of cannibal savages kidnaps settlers from the small town of Bright Hope, an unlikely team of gunslingers, led by Sheriff Hunt (Kurt Russell), sets out to bring them home.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: The Ranger, The Cook And A Hole In The Sky, (1995, Western)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prisonin the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of herearning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: The Spirit, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: In the vein of BATMAN BEGINS and SIN CITY, THE SPIRIT takes us on a sinister, gut-wrenching ride with a hero who is born, murdered and born again.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Open Water, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: When a couple is stranded while scuba diving, they soon realize they are in the middle of shark-infested waters in this intense, critically acclaimed thriller.

programme.title: The Mod Squad, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Big screen version of the trend-setting 1960s television series, contemporizing the premise for the '90s. A trio of juvenile delinquents become undercover cops to infiltrate a drug ring in the ultra-hip L.A. club scene.

programme.title: Air Force One, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: When Russian neo-nationalists hijack Air Force One, the world's most secure aircraft, the President is faced with the decision to give in to terrorist demands or sacrifice the country's dignity and the lives of his wife and daughter.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: XXX, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: Xander Cage is a notorious underground thrill-seeker deemed untouchable by the law. But when NSA Agent Gibbsons convinces Cage to infiltrate a ruthless Russian crime ring, this new breed of secret agent takes down the enemies of justice with a vengeance.

programme.title: Forrest Gump, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Hanks gives an astonishing performance as Forrest, an everyman whose simple innocence comes to embody a generation.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Zombies)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Evolution, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A firefighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky-but-sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving ever since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

programme.title: Black Sheep, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dedicated to helping his big brother Al (Tim Matheson) win the race for Washington State governor, he turns every opportunity for votes into an embarrassing disaster.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start all bets are off!

programme.title: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Desperate to revive his career, Dickie tries to audition for a role in Rob Reiner's new movie but the director doesn't believe Dickie is normal enough to play the part.

programme.title: Party Girl, (1995, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In this raucous comedy, Parker Posey ("Scream 3") stars as a hard-partying NY club girl who takes a job as a librarian.

programme.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun, (1970, Musical)
programme.desc: Sarah Jessica Parker, Helen Hunt, and Shannen Doherty star in the outrageous '80s comedy hit that's totally packed with outrageous '80s fashions, music, dance moves, and more!

programme.title: The Return of Swamp Thing, (1989, Comic Books and Superheroes)
programme.desc: NEW HD TRANSFER. Everyone's favorite muck-encrusted plant-man falls in love with Dr. Arcane's sexy daughter and must rescue her from her father's nefarious and murderous plans.

programme.title: Evolution, (2001, Science fiction)

programme.desc: During a global pandemic, a man must battle swarming hordes of the undead to rescue a female neighbor. This zombie horror tale stars Tyler Posey, Summer Spiro, and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

programme.title: Mom and Dad, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her little brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origins causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.

programme.title: We Summon The Darkness, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: A post-concert party at a remote country mansion turns into a grisly satanic slaughter scene in this dark-humored horror-thriller starring Alexandra Daddario and Johnny Knoxville.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Crawl, (2019, Creature Features)
programme.desc: As a hurricane tears through Florida, Haley rushes to find her father, who is injured and trapped in the crawl space of their home. With the storm intensifying and water levels rising, the pair face an even bigger threat lurking below the surface.

programme.title: P2, (2007, Thriller)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson stars as a Los Angeles policeman who recently lost his wife and has been acting increasingly unstable. Danny Glover plays a homicide detective with an impeccable record and a loving family. Now the two are stuck with each other as partners.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover are back as a volatile pair of LAPD detectives. This time, the cops are unhappy with their assignment to baby-sit an accountant. But the mob wants the accountant deadand is killing everyone who gets in its way.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Police officers Riggs (Mel Gibson) and Murtaugh (Danny Glover) team for the third time. This time, they must track down a crooked cop who has stolen weapons from the Los Angeles police depot.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover reteam as a pair of Los Angeles police detectives. Promoted to desk jobs to keep them out of trouble, the two cops join forces with a junior detective and a fast-talking private investigator to unravel a series of crimes.

programme.title: Awakenings, (1990, Inspirational Drama)

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.
