programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Luffy regains enough Haki to face off against Doflamingo, but his health is still poor. With the Birdcage closing in, is there a technique left in his repertoire that is strong enough to take down Doflamingo?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Attack on a Celestial! Luffy's King Kong Gun of Anger!

programme.title: With Doflamingo thoroughly quashed and the Birdcage collapsing, the people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy remembering the hardships they've endured, and the actions taken by Luffy and the others to free them.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Jesus Burgess of the Blackbeard Pirates tries to agitate Sabo, mocking Ace's final words in order to unsettle him enough that he can try to steal the Flare-Flare Fruit! Meanwhile, people of Dressrosa beg King Riku to resume the crown.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unheard-of! Admiral Fujitoras Surprising Decision!

programme.title: Repercussions of Doflamingo's defeat reverberate around the world! Fujitora's actions put the Navy in a tight spot, and the "Worst Generation" beings to stir into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sending a Shock Wave! The Worst Generation Goes Into Action!

programme.title: The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of the Legend! The Adventures of the Revolutionary Warrior Sabo!

programme.title: Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy's favor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Brothers' Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo's Reunion!

programme.title: As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors - Kaido, King of the Beasts!

programme.title: As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Fujitora's flirting with chance has turned out poorly for the Straw Hats as the full Navy force bears down on Dressrosa searching for the pirates! Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port to get off the island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A State of Emergency! Rebecca Is Kidnapped!

programme.title: Rebecca has precious little time to follow Luffy's lead and make it to Kyros. Can she make it in time? Meanwhile, Fujitora is closing in on Bartolomeo and the other Colosseum warriors while Trafalgar Law faces the shadows of his past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!

programme.title: Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazon, and the secret of Trafalgar Law's name. Meanwhile, Fujitora uses the destruction caused by the battle in Dressrosa as a weapon, and squares off one-on-one with Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Men's Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!

programme.title: The people of Dressrosa show their appreciation to the Straw Hats one last time by foiling Fujitora's strategy. As Luffy and the others are able to finally make their break from the island, however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora's Ruthless Pursuit!

programme.title: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet is Formed!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World

programme.title: While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy's appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto's Great Adventure!

programme.title: The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill's group hides a terrible secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!

programme.title: Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill's assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!

programme.title: Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill's self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!

programme.title: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!

programme.title: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard's Son Appears!

programme.title: Finally scaling the elephant's back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!

programme.title: Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant's back, but he's treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!

programme.title: Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differences And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!

programme.title: Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy's loose lips get them into trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!

programme.title: Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!

programme.title: Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack's amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!

programme.title: Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren't able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time Limit Closes in! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!

programme.title: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack's pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom's Assassins!

programme.title: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can't be refused!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!

programme.title: Sanji's dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom's crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To My Buds! Sanji's Farewell Note!

programme.title: There's only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend's disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Let's Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lady Black and Fujiko have a bet. Whoever kills Lupin will get the loser's entire jewelry collection. Lady Black lures Lupin using Fujiko so she could kill him, but why is she so passionate about wanting him dead?
programme.sub-title: Take Lupin All The Way to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Boss Largo wants Lupin dead; Lupin had just stolen a bundle of the boss's casino profits. But no run of the mill hitman would suffice to wack Lupin. But Largo sees that Lupin is suffering from a toothache, and gets an idea.
programme.sub-title: The Direct Attack! Dead Ball Strategy

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin reads the morning paper, which says that Lupin stole a 100-karat diamond that was being used in a musical. He knows he didn't do it, so he asks Fujiko and others, but they too have no idea what it's all about.
programme.sub-title: Lupin and An Old Woman's Scheme

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The nation of Janaica is troubled with coup d'etats and revolutions, but Lupin, discovering that the president's mansion houses the missing painting "Nude Venus," decides to go scope the joint with Jigen.
programme.sub-title: The Kindness Of Jigen is Seen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Dar had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsne Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of herearning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 1), (1991, Western)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 2), (1991, Western)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: Cariboo Trail, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canada's British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron fight for control of their father's empire

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: The Shooting, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.

programme.title: Trapped, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: The Jennings fight for their daughter's life after she is kidnapped by an experienced gang of thieves.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: The Perfect Score, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Scarlett Johansson, Erika Christensen, Chris Evans, and Darius Miles lead this coming-of-age tale about six students who break into the testing center and steal the answers to the S.A.T.

programme.title: Better Luck Tomorrow, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: To his classmates and teachers, high-schooler Ben Manibag appears to be the model student: a perfectionist and overachiever. But underneath this persona is a darker side. Ben and his bored high-school buddies lead double lives.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Astonishing revelations about a top-secret wing of the U.S. military come to light when a reporter encounters an enigmatic Special Forces operator on a mind-boggling mission.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: The group lives a more peaceful life at the prison and strives to hold onto humanity; problems arise when Rick encounters a new survivor.

programme.title: A group leaves the prison to search for supplies; the remaining members of the group deal with recent losses.

programme.title: Assorted enemies pressure Rick and the group; the survivors and the prison may reach a breaking point.

programme.title: Following his defeat at Woodbury, the Governor wanders aimlessly until he encounters a family in need.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: At the camp outside the prison, the addition of new members threatens the peace; something new unfolds as the Governor plans his next move.

programme.title: Things finally begin to calm at the prison until Rick and the group face imminent danger when the Governor arrives with his forces.

programme.title: Rick and Carl look for shelter while Rick deals with old wounds; those left at the prison consider whether survival alone will be enough.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Beth remains hopeful, and she and Daryl search for other survivors of the Governor's attack; the now-divided group faces obstacles in their quest for safety.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick faces a number of threats while Carl and Michonne look for supplies; Glenn and Tara meet strangers on an important missio; other group members deal with their pasts.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: In the woods after fleeing the prison, Beth makes a request that sends her and Daryl on an enlightening mission.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Luna encounter a girl who appears to be lost. The two are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagis house as her younger sister.
programme.sub-title: Invaders from Outer Space: The Coming of Siren

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.
programme.sub-title: The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Aps se tornar alvo de seu irmo mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irm e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vrios problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendrio cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Dupla em Fria
programme.desc: O jovem detetive Wang Bu'er e seu amigo Huang Feihong embarcam em uma investigao cheia de emoo e eventos inesperados.

programme.title: Operaes Especiais
programme.desc: O ex-agente de operaes especiais Tom Steele (Seagal) e seu parceiro Manning (Austin) recebem a misso de cuidar do fechamento de uma antiga priso. L, eles devem supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras. Quando as verdadeiras identidades das mulheres so reveladas, Steele percebe que eles esto presos no meio de algo muito maior do que ele imaginava.

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Um arqueologo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o misterio de Ragnarok. Porem, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manh eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles tm a fazer pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Ento eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins comeam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Confisses de um Filho
programme.desc: Confisses de um filho prdigo uma verso moderna da histria do filho prdigo que Jesus contou.

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa
programme.desc: Uma histria da era dos valentes cavaleiros, belas princesas e feiticeiros malignos. Ruslan, um artista que sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, conhece e se apaixona pela bela Mila, sem perceber que ela filha do Rei.

programme.title: A Histria de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A Histria de Wim de A a Z) Esta a histria do rfo Wim, que quer muito ir escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando foradamente na fbrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma famlia amorosa.

programme.title: Tempo de Mudanas
programme.desc: Enviada para o rancho do seu pai nos EUA durante o vero, uma adolescente e seu cavalo Lucky Lass competem por uma vaga no National Youth Rodeo.

programme.title: Um Vero Inesquecvel
programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota m. medida que a competio esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Aps uma misso, uma enfermeira do exrcito retorna fazenda da sua av em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Meu Amigo P Grande
programme.desc: Depois de um acidente de bicicleta na floresta, Percy Caldwell encontra um novo amigo, P Grande, uma criatura de dois metros e meio de altura, que foi deslocada por um incndio recente na floresta. Mas quando dois valentes encontram o P Grande, eles decidem captur-lo e explor-lo comercialmente. Agora cabe a Percy, Leonard e Madison resgatar o P Grande e devolv-lo sua casa.

programme.title: Nada para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educao rgida, eles tambm desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, professor e est apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, h uma coisa que sempre os manter juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: A Histria de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A Histria de Wim de A a Z) Esta a histria do rfo Wim, que quer muito ir escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando foradamente na fbrica da cidade. programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Aps uma misso, uma enfermeira do exrcito retorna fazenda da sua av em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Perseguido pelo Destino
programme.desc: Em um circuito de corridas, o gngster Gigi (Matthias Schoenaerts), membro de uma cruel gangue criminosa de Bruxelas, conhece a jovem e rica corredora Bibi (Adle Exarchopoulos). Logo, os dois se apaixonam, mas por causa de suas vidas distintas, a chance de ficarem juntos remota. Mesmo assim, eles iniciam um relacionamento pelo qual lutaro com unhas e dentes, mas que tambm colocar suas vidas em perigo.

programme.title: Procura
programme.desc: A PROCURA, estrelado por Ryan Reynolds, Matthew, pai de Cass, uma garota seqestrada, que est agora com 17 anos, e ela ainda est viva. Em uma corrida terrvel contra o tempo, Matthew, os detetives e at mesmo Cass devem desempenhar as suas partes para resolver o mistrio de seu desaparecimento e liberao do cativeiro

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu pais, uma pobre familia viaja em busca de melhores condicoes de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles sao atacados por uma gangue de crueis fora-da-lei, que so poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: O Mistrio Da Passagem Da Morte
programme.desc: Cinco estudantes norte-americanos viajam para Passagem de Dyatlov em busca de respostas sobre os eventos ocorridos na dcada de 1950, quando nove esquiadores russos morreram inexplicavelmente. Gravando um documentrio, eles percorrem a trilha amaldioada dos Montes Urais e logo comeam a desconfiar que no esto sozinhos no local.

programme.title: O Segredo da Floresta
programme.desc: Durante uma viagem romntica no interior da ndia, um casal de Los Angeles acidentalmente testemunha o exorcismo assustador de uma menina de 11 anos. Eles decidem resgat-la.

programme.title: O Exorcismo de Karen Walker
programme.desc: Um casal descobre um dispositivo Kirlian em sua nova casa. Intrigados com o conceito de fotografar a aura das pessoas, eles, sem saber, liberam um mal antigo.

programme.title: Depois da Escurido
programme.desc: Conforme o sol se apaga, uma famlia se rene para enfrentar o fim do mundo, suas esperanas de resgate lentamente diminuem enquanto enfrentam conflitos entre si.

programme.title: Histria de um Assassinato
programme.desc: Vera (Sienna Miller), uma famosa atriz de Nova York, deixa seu ex-namorado problemtico (Nick Matthews) entrar em seu apartamento. As coisas se complicam quando ele decide atac-la

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) est com vrios problemas em sua vida. O prdio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano est sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dvida. O escolhido Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat v at seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Histria do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianas do Sudo, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixo s crianas e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele no tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: No Rastro da Violncia
programme.desc: Fascinada pelas razes do comportamento violento, a psicloga renomada Dra. Amanda Tyler tem a oportunidade de entrevistar e analisar Jackson Shea, prisioneiro do corredor da morte.

programme.title: Profisso de Risco
programme.desc: Jack contratado por Dragna, um chefo do crime, para realizar uma tarefa aparentemente inocente: ele deve levar uma mala para um motel em Nova Orleans e esperar que ela seja recolhida. Mas Jack nunca conseguir abrir a mala. Mas, no momento em que ele entra no motel, sua vida est em risco. Vrios criminosos tentam tirar a bolsa dele e Jack precisa defend-la se quiser viver.

programme.desc: Um homem de meia-idade que est cansado de seu trabalho e tem de suportar a infidelidade de sua esposa aceita, com relutncia, a tarefa de ser mentor de um adolescente rebelde.

programme.title: Tempos Difceis
programme.desc: A vila de Kilcoulin's Leap j foi uma prspera cidade termal e lar de um famoso Poo Sagrado, mas agora oferece pouco emprego para seu povo. programme.desc: Enquanto Gon est com Palm, Killua encontra Rammot na floresta. Quando a batalha vai comear, Killua ouve a voz de seu irmo dizendo-lhe para fugir.

programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho - S1E33

programme.title: O quinto combate entre Tenten e Temari. Tenten, mestre em armas areas e vrias outras, que so repelidas pelo leque de Temari. O sexto combate entre Shikamaru e Kin. Kin parece estar em vantagem, mas Shikamaru usa seu Jutsu Possesso da Sombra.

programme.title: No oitavo combate, os primos Hinata e Neji do cl Hyuga se enfrentam. Embora a tmida Hinata no seja preo para a agressividade de Neji, ela consegue ganhar fora ao escutar as palavras de Naruto. Como ser que esta batalha terminar?
programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem! - S1E46

programme.title: Hinata enfrenta Neji, mas ele ataca o ponto de presso dela com Byakugan (olhos brancos). O fluxo de chakra de Hinata para, e ela quase perde a conscincia. Ela encontra coragem ao lembrar como Naruto no desiste de nenhuma dificuldade.
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Derrota Digna - S1E47

programme.title: No nono combate, Gaara finalmente aparece e seu oponente Lee, um especialista em taijutsu (tcnica fsica). Lee usa esta poderosa tcnica contra Gaara, que manipula areia de sua cabaa. Ento, a Armadura de Areia de Gaara finalmente se solta...
programme.desc: Naruto: Gaara Conta Rock Lee, O Poder Da Juventude Explode - S1E48

programme.title: Lee usa a tcnica banida, Ltus Primria, para atacar Gaara. A luta parece ter terminado, mas a manobra apenas danifica a proteo feita pela areia de Gaara. Imvel aps de ter usado Ltus Primria, Lee lanado facilmente por toda parte por Gaara.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Fora Oculta De Lee: Um Jutsu Secreto Proibido - S1E49

programme.title: Lee decide usar a manobra proibida, Ltus Oculta, que libera trs ou mais dos oito portais que possuem a concentrao dos pontos de chakra. Quando os oito portais se abrem, o usurio pode morrer. Mas Gaara responde com seu prprio ataque, Atade de Areia.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Quinto Porto, Um Ninja Esplndido - S1E50

programme.title: No ltimo combate das preliminares, Choji luta contra o capanga de Orochimaru, Dosu. As preliminares finalmente terminam, e o Hokage revela a terceira prova, enquanto Orochimaru comea secretamente seu plano maligno.
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Sombra Na Escurido: O Perigo Se Aproxima De Sasuke - S1E51

programme.title: Na preparao para a terceira prova, Kakashi escolhe Ebisu para treinar Naruto. Ebisu diz a Naruto que ele ainda no controla seu chakra o suficiente e o faz caminhar sobre gua. Naruto aprende rpido e impressiona Ebisu. Ento, uma figura aparece...
programme.desc: Naruto: Ebisu Volta: O Treinamento Mais Duro De Naruto - S1E52

programme.title: Jiraiya, um dos Sannin lendrios, aparece de repente diante de Ebisu e Naruto. Naruto d a Jiraiya o apelido de "Sbio Tarado".
programme.desc: Naruto: Aps Muito Tempo...Jiraiya Retorna! - S1E53

programme.title: O ninja do Som, Dosu, aparece diante de Gaara e pretende derrot-lo, mas o oposto acontece. Um jonin da Aldeia da Areia e Kabuto os observam secretamente.
programme.desc: Naruto: Jutsu De Invocao : A Sabedoria Do Sbio Do Sapo! - S1E54

programme.title: Naruto continua seu treino com Jiraiya para dominar o Jutsu de Invocao, que chama vrias criaturas selvagens. Mas ele tem dificuldades em controlar o Chacra da Raposa de Nove Caudas.
programme.desc: Naruto: Um Sentimento De Anseio, Uma Flor Cheia De Esperana - S1E55

programme.title: J se passaram trs semanas que Naruto treina com Jiraiya. E Naruto esteve a ponto de cair vrias vezes.
programme.desc: Naruto: Viva Ou Morra : Arrisque Tudo Para Ganhar Tudo - S1E56

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras - S2E80
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes - S2E81
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez - S2E82
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira! - S2E83
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu - S2E84
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo - S2E85
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru - S2E86
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo! - S2E87
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken! - S2E88
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder - S2E89
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi - S2E90
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto! - S2E91
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro - S2E92
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conectando Coraes - S2E93
programme.desc: Acreditando que o novo jutsu do naruto est quase pronto, jiraiya vai investigar novas informaes sobre as aes da akatsuki

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Noite Chuvosa - S2E94
programme.desc: Atrs do esconderijo, rinji e gozu descobrem que um shinobi seguiu seus passos. Kakashi e sua equipe notam que o inimigo est usando um morcego para vigilncia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Amuletos - S2E95
programme.desc: Na aldeia da folha naruto est ocupado treinando com gamakichi e gamatatsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Inimigo Invisvel - S2E96
programme.desc: A equipe yamato segue para dar reforo equipe kakashi. Bem antes de sua partida naruto recebe uma dica para aperfeioar seu novo jutsu entrando na barriga de gamatatsu

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Labirinto Dos Reflexos Distorcidos - S2E97
programme.desc: Atravs dos resultados da anlise dos insetos parasitrios cristalizados, os inimigos atualmente lutando com a equipe kakashi so identificados como usurios do estilo cristal, um tipo raro de jutsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Alvo Revelado - S2E98
programme.desc: Quebrando o campo de fora com seu recente jutsu com os sapos, naruto e a unidade de apoio chega ao local da batalha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Besta De Cauda Barulhenta - S2E99
programme.desc: Os ninjas da folha usam os morcegos para procurar guren. Akamaru e kiba descobrem um alto nvel de chakra em seu destino

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Dentro Do Nevoeiro - S2E100
programme.desc: Dentro de uma nvoa pesada, os ninjas da folha tentam achar o naruto. A equipe aumenta a guarda quando fica sabendo que a nvoa que cerca o lago causa iluses.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sentimento De Cada Um - S2E101
programme.desc: Naruto entra na nvoa para procurar yukimaru. Guren fica alerta para proteger yukimaru, cuja situao atual o impede de se mexer.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reagrupando! - S2E102
programme.desc: Chegam os reforos da aldeia da folha. A nova misso de tsunade: selar a besta de trs caudas assim no cair nas mos de qualquer outro e capturar yukimaru cujos poderes esto ligados nesta.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E60
programme.desc: A prova chega etapa final, com o incio dos confrontos de Sarada contra Araya, da Aldeia da Areia, e Mitsuki contra Shinki, tambm da Areia!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E61
programme.desc: A batalha final do torneio comea com Boruto, Sarada e Shinki participando de uma disputa no estilo mata-mata.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E62
programme.desc: Momoshiki, Kinshiki e Urashiki, todos do Cl Otsutsuki, aparecem de repente na arena lotada de espectadores, e Boruto v de perto a extenso do poder de combate do pai.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E63
programme.desc: Boruto percebe o tamanho do amor de seu pai pela aldeia e as pessoas, o que tambm acaba sendo sua fraqueza.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E64
programme.desc: Sasuke e os Kages travam uma batalha intensa contra Momoshiki e Kinshiki do Cl Otsutsuki que so ridiculamente poderosos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E65

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E66
programme.desc: Boruto j pediu desculpas a todos pelos erros cometidos durante a prova, mas continua preocupado com a profecia de Momoshiki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E67
programme.desc: Os famosos atores Tomaru e Ashina recebem ameaas de morte de uma pessoa desconhecida. Agora cabe s Equipes 7 e 10 os protegerem em uma misso em conjunto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E68
programme.desc: O flerte de Tomaru deixa Cho-Cho nas nuvens, o que faz Sarada e os outros se perguntarem se a apaixonada Cho-Cho no perdeu o foco na misso!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E69

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E71
programme.desc: Aps o ataque do Cl Otsutsuki, o Encontro dos Cinco Kages acontece na Aldeia da Folha. Os Kages atuais e seus predecessores se renem, exceto por Ohnoki, o Terceiro Tsuchikage.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E72
programme.desc: Os ninjas encarregados de guardar o Porto da Aldeia da Folha so atacados, e Mitsuki desaparece.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E73
programme.desc: A aldeia descobre que Boruto e Sarada saram em busca de Mitsuki. Ento a Equipe 10, de Shikadai, recebe a misso de rastre-los e traz-los de volta.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E74
programme.desc: Orochimaru fala para Boruto e Sakura sobre o Sbio da Cobra Branca que vive na Caverna Ryuchi. No caminho, os dois so confrontados pela Equipe 10.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E75
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos descobrem que, para se encontrar com o Sbio da Cobra Branca, precisaro passar por uma srie de testes.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E76
programme.desc: O Sbio da Cobra Branca pede que Boruto traga para ele uma "Escama Invertida" de Garaga, uma cobra problemtica.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E77
programme.desc: Boruto e companhia trabalham juntos para conseguir a Escama Invertida de Garaga, mas a batalha se mostra difcil, uma vez que Garaga tem o poder de sentir a localizao dos inimigos e transform-los em pedra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E78
programme.desc: Mitsuki vai para a terra natal de Kokuyou e Sekiei, o Pas da Terra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E79
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos conseguem superar Kokuyou e finalmente alcanam Mitsuki.

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E32

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E33

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E46

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E47

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)
programme.desc: Seasoned warrior Sarah Connor joins forces with a hybrid cyborg human and the T-800 model to protect a young woman from the Rev-9 -- a newly modified and seemingly indestructible liquid Terminator from the future.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer (2011)
programme.desc: A lawyer (Matthew McConaughey) who operates out of the back of his Lincoln Continental lands the case of a lifetime when he defends a Beverly Hills playboy accused of attempted murder.

programme.title: Boogie Nights (1997)
programme.desc: A producer (Burt Reynolds) guides a young man (Mark Wahlberg) to success in the 1970s porn industry, but greed and egotism lead to his downfall in the 80s.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa (2013)
programme.desc: Irving Zisman (Johnny Knoxville) takes his young and impressionable grandson (Jackson Nicoll) on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie (2002)
programme.desc: Nitwits (Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Chris Pontius) perform outrageous stunts and pull practical jokes on an unsuspecting public.

programme.title: Jackass: Number Two (2006)
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: The Mist (2007)
programme.desc: Trapped townspeople (Thomas Jane, Marcia Gay Harden, Laurie Holden) face monsters inside and out after a supernatural fog engulfs their Maine community.

programme.title: Congo (1995)
programme.desc: Killer gorillas menace an ex-CIA agent (Laura Linney), a primatologist (Dylan Walsh) and others on a mission in Africa.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: Hide and Seek (2021)
programme.desc: When a wealthy businessman follows a lead to find his missing brother, he dives headlong into a twisted underworld of squatters and vagrants that threatens to tear apart his family as he struggles to maintain his sanity.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train (2016)
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her divorce, spends her commute fantasizing about the couple that lives in a house that her train passes. One morning, she sees something shocking and becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation.

programme.title: Faster (2010)
programme.desc: A veteran cop (Billy Bob Thornton) and an assassin (Oliver Jackson-Cohen) track an ex-convict (Dwayne Johnson) who is on a mission to take revenge on his brothers killers.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)
programme.desc: An Allied officer (Brad Pitt) and his team of Jewish soldiers join forces with a German actress and undercover agent to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)
programme.desc: An Allied officer (Brad Pitt) and his team of Jewish soldiers join forces with a German actress and undercover agent to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.title: The Untouchables (1987)
programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy Citys police force.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail (2020)
programme.desc: Indebted to a mobster, a desperate producer tries to "accidentally" kill an aging movie star for an insurance scam. However, he soon begins to realize that the film theyre shooting is a masterpiece in the making.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers (2006)
programme.desc: Some of the servicemen who raised the U.S. flag on Mount Suribachi during the Battle of Iwo Jima at the end of World War II live to hear of their status as heroes.

programme.title: Uncommon Valor (1983)
programme.desc: A colonel with a sponsor leads five Marine veterans into Laos to find his son and others missing in action.

programme.title: The Four Feathers (2002)
programme.desc: Accused of cowardice for resigning when assigned to a dangerous post, a former British soldier (Heath Ledger) tries to help his old regiment fight rebels in Africa.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Marathon Man (1976)
programme.desc: The CIA and a Nazi death-camp dentist (Laurence Olivier) chase a New York graduate student (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: Downhill Racer (1969)
programme.desc: A cocky American (Robert Redford) skis and apres-skis Europe, training with his coach (Gene Hackman) for the Olympics.

programme.title: Black Rain (1989)
programme.desc: Two New York police detectives (Michael Douglas, Andy Garcia) take an underworld upstart back to Osaka, Japan.

programme.title: The Gunman (2015)
programme.desc: A former Special Forces soldier (Sean Penn) who has PTSD tries to reconnect with his longtime lover, but must first find out who wants him dead... and why.

programme.title: Judgment Night (1993)
programme.desc: On their way to a boxing match, four young men take a wrong turn in Chicago and find danger as witnesses to murder.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement (2000)
programme.desc: A decorated career Marine (Samuel L. Jackson), about to stand trial for a botched rescue mission, asks an old friend (Tommy Lee Jones) to defend him.

programme.title: Hit and Run (2012)
programme.desc: A former getaway driver (Dax Shepard) finds feds and his former gang members on his tail when he breaks out of the Witness Protection Program to help his girlfriend (Kristen Bell) get to Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe (2016)
programme.desc: When father and son coroners investigate the death of a beautiful "Jane Doe," they find increasingly bizarre clues.

programme.title: Awake (2007)
programme.desc: A young man (Hayden Christensen) who is undergoing surgery experiences anesthesia awareness, which leaves him alert but paralyzed and unable to warn his doctors.

programme.title: The Fifth Estate (2013)
programme.desc: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange (Benedict Cumberbatch) and his colleague, Daniel Domscheit-Berg (Daniel Bruhl), provide a platform for whistle-blowers to leak covert data anonymously and expose government secrets and corporate crimes.

programme.title: Texas Rangers (2001)
programme.desc: Young men (James Van Der Beek, Dylan McDermott, Usher Raymond) band together to stop a ruthless bandit from engineering raids on cattle ranchers.

programme.title: Alone in Berlin (2016)
programme.desc: A German couple lose their son in WWII, prompting them to become secretly anti-Nazi.

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: The Score (2021)
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks drive to a secluded cafe for a big score.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies (2015)
programme.desc: During the Cold War, a CIA operative (Scott Shepherd) recruits New York lawyer James Donovan (Tom Hanks) to negotiate a prisoner exchange for captured U.S. pilot Francis Gary Powers (Austin Stowell).

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: Warrior Strong (2023)
programme.desc: Trying to save his career, a suspended professional basketball player returns home to coach his former high school team.

programme.title: Allied (2016)
programme.desc: World War II operative Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) falls for French Resistance fighter Marianne Beausejour (Marion Cotillard) during a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Reunited in London, a devastating secret tests their love and loyalty to each other.

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies (2015)
programme.desc: During the Cold War, a CIA operative (Scott Shepherd) recruits New York lawyer James Donovan (Tom Hanks) to negotiate a prisoner exchange for captured U.S. pilot Francis Gary Powers (Austin Stowell).

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: Hardcore Henry (2015)
programme.desc: A half-human, half-robotic hybrid embarks on a bloody rampage through Moscow to save his kidnapped wife (Haley Bennett) from a madman (Danila Kozlovsky) and his army of thugs.

programme.title: Mercy (2023)
programme.desc: An ex-military doctor finds herself in a fight for survival when the Irish mafia seizes control of the hospital at which she works. When her son is taken hostage, shes forced to rely on her battle-hardened past and lethal skills to save the day.

programme.title: On the Edge (2022)
programme.desc: A metro driver witnesses his son die and sets out to track down those who are responsible.

programme.title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi captures a snapshot of America as the country faces a pandemic, a presidential election and a costly financial collapse.

programme.title: Eric Clapton: Life in 12 Bars (2017)
programme.desc: Eric Clapton is widely renowned as one of the greatest performers of all time. His isolated pursuit of his craft, and fear of selling out, served as a catalyst for his evolution as an artist.

programme.title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
programme.sub-title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Oliver Stone examines the circumstances surrounding the assassination of President John F. Kennedy on Nov. 22, 1963, in Dallas.

programme.title: Black Noise (2023)
